Computer.file:
we intend to stand up to an organisation as evil as Nutrico and you guys continue to leave the IS server connected to this node? their hacker cronies are gonna blast this node wide open one day and you guys are putting us at an enormous risk!
this is meant to be a CLANDESTINE operation! stop logging in from internal services, use your damn proxies!
i've deleted the logs for it, but I *really* don't want to see you guys do it again!
~ "the IT guy", as you so eloquently keep putting it
